settings.display_name: Allow users to attach and create Jira issues in Mattermost
settings.help_text:
When false, users cannot attach and create Jira issues in Mattermost. Does not affect Jira webhook notifications. After changing this setting to false, disable, then re-enable this plugin in **System Console > Plugins > Plugin Management** to reset the plugin state for all users. 
 
 When true, install this plugin to your Jira instance with '/jira installâ€™ to allow users to create and manage issues across Mattermost channels. See [documentation](https://about.mattermost.com/default-jira-plugin-link-application) to learn more.
The secret used to authenticate the webhook to Mattermost.
settings.regenerate_help_text: Regenerates the secret for the webhook URL endpoint. Regenerating the secret invalidates your existing Jira integrations.

settings.display_name: Mattermost Roles Allowed to Edit Jira Subscriptions
settings.help_text: Mattermost users that can subscribe channels to Jira tickets.

settings.display_name: Jira Groups Allowed to Edit Jira Subscriptions
settings.help_text: Comma separated list of Group Names. List the Jira user groups who can create subscriptions. If none are specified, any Jira user can create a subscription.

settings_schema.footer:
Use this webhook URL to set up the Jira integration. See [documentation](https://about.mattermost.com/default-jira-plugin) to learn more.

`https://SITEURL/plugins/jira/webhook?secret=WEBHOOKSECRET&team=TEAMURL&channel=CHANNELURL`
